entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tadoule Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 37. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
